description: '''Gerald Conway''' (11 September 1947 â€“ 29 March 2024) was an English [[rock music|rock]] drummer and percussionist. He performed with the backing band for [[Cat Stevens]] in the 1970s, with [[Jethro Tull (band)|Jethro Tull]] during the 1980s, and was a member of [[Fairport Convention]] from 1998 to 2022. Conway also worked as a [[session musician]]. He was married to vocalist [[Jacqui McShee]], the singer of the band [[Pentangle (band)|Pentangle]], of which he was also a member.
